post_detail.description: 106 & Park, one of BET’s most popular shows, has always engaged its viewers and its new iPhone app is no exception.  The 106 & Park App from BET lets you become a part of “the livest audience on TV” without ever leaving your couch. The app includes many of the basics you would expect, but also ties into location and social networks to create a more interactive experience. It adds another layer to the show that creates an “all-new 106 & Park experience.”  To promote this awesome new iPhone app, Click 3X created 5 in app feature promos, as well as an overview App promo to illustrate just how cool this app is!
post_detail.title: BET 106&Park App
